page.title: 07A WEEK IN OUR LIVES
page.content: We all kept a diary for a week from Sunday 5th May to Saturday 11th May. The Sunday and Monday formed part of the spring bank holiday known as May day.I read through everyone's diarys and this is what most people did on those days. Sunday:Five people went to church.One brownie did church parade.Mums did gardening,cleaning and baking.It rained so six children played games and watched t.v.One person went swimming. Monday:Someone watched a football match.It was bank holiday and most boys watched 'Hawk The Slayer'.One person went to the link centre for ice-skating. Tuesday:Some people did their hedge topic for school today.They also watched t.v.Some people did gymnastics at an after school club.
